price: Tunay na Kami, noong umapaw ang tubig, ay nagdala sa inyo sa nagpapatianod[669]
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
